code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[response,setResponse]=useState("");const uploadResume=async()=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append("file",file);try{const res=await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/upload",formData);setResponse(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Error uploading file",err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Resume Analyzer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0]),accept:".txt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:uploadResume,children:"Upload"}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Feedback:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Score: ",response.score.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:response.feedback})]})]});}export default App;
